ComicInfo.Summary: In the final showdown, its Warrior Nun Areala, Jade and Lord Akuma, plus Mother Superion and her Black Angels squadron against Ottoman and his army of were-cheetahs; Father Gomez talks the suicidal Army vet into finding a new and better purpose for his life.
